submissionInfo: Submit the link to your social media post and a screenshot of the post as proof of completion.
taskDetails: Share a post about our website on your social media profile (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or LinkedIn). Make sure to include a brief description of our services and a link to our homepage.
taskTitle: Promote our website on your social media

submissionInfo: Submit the link to your blog post and a screenshot of the published article as proof of completion.
taskDetails: Write a detailed blog post about our latest product and publish it on your blog. Include your personal review and a link to our product page.

submissionInfo: Submit the link to your YouTube video and a screenshot of the video analytics as proof of completion.
taskDetails: Create a YouTube video reviewing our service. Mention its features, benefits, and your personal experience. Include a link to our website in the video description.
